org.springframework.cache.annotation

接口 AnnotationCacheOperationSource.CacheOperationProvider

  • 封闭类:
    AnnotationCacheOperationSource
    函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
protected static interface AnnotationCacheOperationSource.CacheOperationProvider
    Callback interface providing CacheOperation instance(s) based on a given CacheAnnotationParser.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Collection<CacheOperation> getCacheOperations(CacheAnnotationParser parser)
      Return the CacheOperation instance(s) provided by the specified parser.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCacheOperations

        @Nullable
Collection<CacheOperation> getCacheOperations(CacheAnnotationParser parser)
        Return the CacheOperation instance(s) provided by the specified parser.
        参数:
        parser - the parser to use
        返回:
        the cache operations, or null if none found
